channel.title: How to make people mod when youre co owner
channel.description:
so im a co owner on this server called ......and i want to know how to make people mod i tryed ::givemod (username)and gave me no comment then i did ::makemod (username) it gave me error saying wrong syntax do as ::make #### # im like what can anyone help me i also did ::make (username)
and ::make (username) mod still didnt work.
i think this topic goes in server help if not tell me where i should post it thank you :D

@magicrcher_2 wrote:

thank you jame and hunderd times! i dont want to give owner and givemod doesnt wrok!!!

item.title: How to make people mod when youre co owner
item.dc:creator: @jamessemple jamessemple
item.description:
@jamessemple wrote:

when you tried to do ::makemod the server only recognized the command as ::make and left out the mod part and the command ::make generally is a command that changes your ip o.O

Read full topic

It’s just an example of certain-user-only commands

item.title: How to make people mod when youre co owner
item.dc:creator: @Mercifies Mercifies
item.description:
@Mercifies wrote:

[code] } else if (command.startsWith(“givemod”) && playerRights >= 3) {
String name = command.substring(8);

        try {
            int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name);
            client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p];

            c.playerRights = 1;
            c.savemoreinfo();
            c.savechar();
            c.disconnected = true;
            PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (name + " is now a Moderator");
        } catch (Exception e) {
            sendMessage(name + " either isn't online or doesn't exist");
        }[/code]

Read full topic
